          <title>
            <string language="en">Lifetime of the Universe versus mass</string>
            <string language="x-mt-de">Lebenszeit des Universums gegen Masse</string>
            <string language="x-mt-fr">Vie de l'univers contre la masse</string>
            <string language="x-mt-pt">Vida do universo contra a massa</string>
            <string language="x-mt-it">Corso della vita dell'universo contro massa</string>
            <string language="x-mt-el">Διάρκεια ζωής του κόσμου εναντίον της μάζας</string>
            <string language="x-mt-es">Curso de la vida del universo contra masa</string>
          </title>
          <description>
            <string language="en">The graph shows the probable lifetime of the Universe as a function of its total mass.</string>
          </description>
          <language>x-none</language>
          <keyword>
            <string language="en">Big Crunch</string>
          </keyword>

          </keyword>
          <keyword>

          </keyword>

          </keyword>

          <description>
            <string language="x-mt-de">Das Diagramm zeigt die wahrscheinliche Lebenszeit
des Universums als Funktion seiner Gesamtmasse.</string>
          </description>
          <description>
            <string language="x-mt-fr">Le graphique montre la vie probable de l'univers 
en fonction de sa masse totale.</string>
          </description>
          <description>
            <string language="x-mt-pt">O gráfico mostra a vida provável do universo em
função de sua massa total.</string>
          </description>
          <description>
            <string language="x-mt-it">Il grafico mostra il corso della vita probabile 
dell'universo in funzione della relativa massa totale.</string>
          </description>
          <description>
            <string language="x-mt-el">Η γραφική παράσταση εμφανίζει πιθανή διάρκεια ζωής 
του κόσμου ως λειτουργία της συνολικής μάζας της.</string>
          </description>
          <description>
            <string language="x-mt-es">El gráfico muestra el curso de la vida probable 
del universo en función de su masa total.</string>
          </description>
